title: "Machine learning score using stress CMR may predict death in patients with CAD"
excerpt: "A score derived from machine learning that included information from stress cardiac magnetic resonance effectively predicted 10-year all-cause death in patients with known or suspected CAD, researchers reported at EuroEcho 2021."
